channel.title: 508 Error
channel.description: #1: Im using davidscape and I changed my rights to 2 and it resets my character. #2: Im connecting to davidscape v.7 using Fathienblade client v.4 i get this error. Not sure what it is and the client goes white. I made myself right = 2 and i save and log in and client crashes. Any Ideas? [code]Error: Class68_Sub13_Sub15:259 Login:254 client:734 Applet_Sub1:1245 Applet_Sub1 :156 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true[/code]

item.title: 508 Error
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It does this the first time you log in (register) into an account. pure2ownage was correct, it was a silly antileech. To fix it, change p.height = * in login.java and filemanager.java

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Error
item.dc:creator: @coop022 coop022
item.description:
@coop022 wrote:

Did You Open your character file with wordpad? =/

item.title: 508 Error
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

#1:
Im using davidscape and I changed my rights to 2 and it resets my character.
#2:
Im connecting to davidscape v.7 using Fathienblade client v.4
i get this error.
Not sure what it is and the client goes white.
I made myself right = 2 and i save and log in and client crashes.
Any Ideas?

Error: Class68_Sub13_Sub15:259 Login:254 client:734 Applet_Sub1:1245 Applet_Sub1 :156 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true
